scripts.build:all: npm run build:src && npm run build:serverextension
scripts.build:src: rimraf build && tsc --project src && node scripts/copyfiles.js
scripts.build:test: rimraf test/build && tsc --project test/src && webpack --config test/webpack.conf.js
scripts.build:serverextension: cd jupyterlab && rimraf build && tsc --project src && webpack
scripts.clean: rimraf docs && rimraf lib && rimraf test/build && rimraf test/coverage && rimraf jupyterlab/build
scripts.clean:slate: npm run clean && npm run clean:examples && rimraf jupyterlab/node_modules && rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.docs: typedoc --mode modules --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --target es5 --moduleResolution node --out docs/ src
scripts.preversion: npm update && npm run postinstall && npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:test && cd test && python run-test.py --browsers=Chrome karma.conf.js
scripts.test:coverage: tsc --project test/src && webpack --config test/webpack-cov.conf.js && cd test && python run-test.py karma-cov.conf.js
scripts.test:debug: npm run build:test && cd test && python run-test.py  --browsers=Chrome --singleRun=false --debug=true karma.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build:test && cd test && python run-test.py --browsers=Firefox karma.conf.js
scripts.test:ie: npm run build:test && cd test && python run-test.py  --browsers=IE karma.conf.js
scripts.watch:test: watch "npm run build && npm test" src test/src --wait 10 --ignoreDotFiles
